description:
Alex"

A new technique to steal someone's Chrome cookies once you've compromised their machine. Cooler because it doesn't need root 😎. This talk is about how the technique was found, how it works, and what you can do with it.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/stealing-chrome-cookies-without-a-password

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Fri Aug  2 13:30:00 2019 at C3.
title: Stealing Chrome cookies without a password
